name: BugsEye
description:
BugsEye is a stand-alone game-based system to assist novice programmers in improving debugging skills. This application envisions reducing the complexity and abstract nature of computer programming. It aims to help novice programmers demystify coding structures and elements in a fun and interactive way. 

Developed by: Edward Jose B. Babasa, Angeline Kris D. Diaz, and Nathaniel M. Labrador
